snippet: Mr. Volodarsky’s films are recognized classics today in Russia, but his scripts cast doubt on the carefully manicured history of the Soviet Union and spent years on the shelves of state studios.
abstract: Eduard Y Volodarsky, Russian screenwriter silenced by Soviets, dies at age 71.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Volodarsky’s films are recognized classics today in Russia, but his scripts cast doubt on the carefully manicured history of the Soviet Union and spent years on the shelves of state studios.

headline.seo: Eduard Volodarsky, Screenwriter Banned by Soviets, Dies at 71
headline.main: Eduard Volodarsky, Screenwriter Banned by Soviets, Dies at 71
headline.print_headline: Eduard Y. Volodarsky, 71, Screenwriter Silenced by the Soviets
